ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] The little things in life... (patch stuff)
ygData.msgSnippet: I got a you have gotten better at singing (201) message last night. Sylly and i been singing lots and lots to get mid-way 54 so my guess is they raised the
ygData.messageBody:
I got a "you have gotten better at singing (201)" message last night.

Sylly

and i been singing lots and lots to get mid-way 54 so my guess is they
raised the caps

-----Original Message-----
From: Mott, Mike J. [mailto:mike.j.mott@...]
Sent: Thursday, November 16, 2000 10:48 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] The little things in life... (patch stuff)


Although I dont have a link available, I stumbled across an Absor post
saying that the instrument skill cap for bards has been raised!

Lago Bardoon of Bertox
51st Minstrel
Guild Leader, Defenders of Aleria
